import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import './MainDashboard.css' export default function MainDashboard() { const slides = [ { title: "Fast Complaint Resolution", text: "Students raise issues instantly. Wardens and workers respond quickly with real-time updates.", image: "/assets/slide1.jpg" }, { title: "Transparent Workflow", text: "Track every stage â€” pending, accepted, in-progress, completed. Total clarity for everyone.", image: "/assets/slide2.jpg" }, { title: "Smart, Simple & Reliable", text: "Built for hostel life. Manage maintenance effortlessly with organized dashboards.", image: "/assets/slide3.jpg" } ] const [index, setIndex] = useState(0) const sliderRef = useRef(null) useEffect(() => { const timer = setInterval(() => { setIndex(prev => (prev + 1) % slides.length) }, 4500) return () => clearInterval(timer) }, []) function scrollToSection(id) { const el = document.getElementById(id) if (el) el.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }) } return (
{/* HERO SECTION */}

Hostel Hub

Smart Hostel Complaint Management System

A clean, fast and reliable platform for managing hostel maintenance. Students raise complaints, wardens track and verify them, workers update progress â€” all in one place.

{/* SLIDER SECTION */}
{slides.map((s, i) => (

{s.title}

setIndex(i)} /> ))}
{/* ABOUT SECTION */}

About Hostel Hub

Hostel Hub is a streamlined solution for managing hostel complaints. It eliminates outdated manual processes and brings transparency and speed to every step.

For Students

Raise complaints instantly with image uploads and track progress in real time.

For Wardens

Review and approve complaints, monitor activities, and maintain oversight.

For Workers

Receive assigned complaints, add updates, and mark tasks as completed.

{/* FEATURES SECTION */}

Features

ðŸ“Œ Image-Based Complaints

Students attach photos to help quickly identify issues.

ðŸ“Œ Real-Time Tracking

Statuses update instantly: pending, accepted, in-process, completed.

ðŸ“Œ Worker Updates

Workers post real-time activity logs for warden visibility.

ðŸ“Œ Completion History

Wardens get a read-only timeline of completed tasks.
